venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
Every month we'll be speaking in detail about an aspect of investigating paranormal phenomena, from how best to use equipment (and what equipment is best to use) to how to find places to investigate or even how to find reliable team members for your own group!  These are very interactive meetings and full of the information you want or need to know.

We'll post the specific topic approximately a week in advance each month so if you have your own equipment you'll know which to bring along if you want more information on it.

Although this monthly meeting is built for those who want to investigate (or already are), everyone else, from the curious to the skeptical, are also very welcome!
item.how_to_find_us: How to find us: from I-95, take exit 3 to Route 33 West The Center is located 2.6 miles on the right at the corner of 33 and Bayside
item.name: Investigating Paranormal Topics
